scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js && cp package.json build && cp -r i18n build/i18n && cp -r core build/core && cp -r data build/data && cp -r vendor build/vendor && cp -r common build/common && cp -r views build/views && cp -r styles build/styles && cp manifest.webapp build/ && cp -r images build/images && find ./components -iname "*.html" -exec rsync -R '{}' ./build/ \;
scripts.dev: webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp package.json build && cp -r i18n build/i18n && cp -r core build/core && cp -r vendor build/vendor && cp -r common build/common && cp -r views build/views && cp -r styles build/styles && cp manifest.webapp build/ && cp -r images build/images && find ./components -iname "*.html" -exec rsync -R '{}' ./build/ \;
